description: In this exciting 2h presentation, Linus will teach us how to not fuck up massively during group projects and how to protect your files AGAINST YOURSELF
Local entrepreneur Mirza 'Strimlaren' Mesinovic will bring his expert level skills within trading algorithims and how to make it big in Bollywood BABY

Our very own Malmö-Walter White will teach us about the dangers and wonders of cooking meth, technologically speaking ;) OBSOBSOBS, this is not about drugs, only a joke with drug.like-references. Let's partyyyy!!! But also, stay in school, kidz. U R not 2 cool for school

topic: How To Get Your Dog To Just CALM THE FUCK DOWN
description: Eva 'evesteve' Björling is a one-stop-shop for all your dog/work-balance needs. In this multi-media presenation complete with obedience activities - she and her loco dog Stevie will teach you how to exhaust your dog to the point of near death, so YOU can focus

topic: How To Design Your Website and Your Life
description: Is your life dull and colorless? Local legend Jumi 'elevrådsrepresentant' Strandberg will spice up your life, Spice Girls-style! Learn valuable skills within coding and life coaching, and join us in our pyramid-scheme extravaganza!

topic: How to Code and Chill With Your Child
description: Are you a parent first and a coder sencond? Make your job and your child your primary concerns without leaving anyone or anything behind! This may or may not include child labour, come to find out!

duration: 1-5h depending on your weak-ass body, bro
topic: How To Maintain Gainz and Brainz
description: Is your body slowly decaying from sitting down and coding/snacking day after day after day?? Have no fear, Aleksei is here! In this equally informative and muscule-building session, you will learn how to clench your thighs, balance on a ball, bench your workdesk, and keep up your cardio - all while coding!
